description:
$ euca-describe-tags --filter resource-id=vol-nnn
returns tags for i-nnn instance.

For example:
$ euca-describe-tags
TAG	i-0000000e	instance	xxx	yyy

$ euca-describe-tags --filter resource-id=vol-0000000e
TAG	i-0000000e	instance	xxx	yyy
title: No type check for resource-id value in EC2 describe_tags filter

comments.content:
$ euca-describe-tags --filter resource-id=vol-nnn
returns tags for ami-nnn instance.

For example:
$ euca-describe-tags
TAG	i-0000000e	instance	xxx	yyy

$ euca-describe-tags --filter resource-id=vol-0000000e
TAG	i-0000000e	instance	xxx	yyy
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ftersin
